paper_abstract: In this letter, a generalized type of Cohen-Grossberg neural networks with time delays are discussed and their global robust stability of the equilibrium point is investigated. By introducing a set of Lyapunov functionals, several new sufficient conditions guaranteeing the global robust convergence are derived. The results show that the amplification function a (i) (x) is harmless to the robust stability of Cohen-Grossberg neural networks. Two examples are given to demonstrate the applicability of the proposed results.
paper_title: New results on the robust stability of Cohen-Grossberg neural networks with delays
